name: War is a Losing Game: '62 - DEMO
name_original: War is a Losing Game: '62 - DEMO
description:
"This is a war to end all wars."

The Second World War never happened. Once the Great War has concluded, the suffering that it left behind caused a great change in military politics. Instead of waiting for another, countries around the globe came together to create the Protection Enforcement Agency for Conflict on Earth (P.E.A.C.E).

War is a Losing Game: '62 is a 2D detective game set in the Russian city of Dyravieschitte.

Created for a University project.

Controls Walk LeftAWalk RightDInteractLeft ClickMove Camera LeftLeft ArrowMove Camera RightRight ArrowReset CameraHome Key
